<br/><br/>


```{r load, warning=F, echo=F}
library(gapminder)
library(tibble)
library(DT)
```

## 3 ways to print out gapminder data:

### 1. Convert it as data.frame and use head function 
```{r}
newdat<-data.frame(gapminder)
head(newdat)
```

<br/>

### 2. Print out a tibble object
```{r Output2}
as_tibble(gapminder)
```

<br/>

### 3. Use datatable function 
```{r}
datatable(as_tibble(gapminder))
```
